title: nerf talon but not fiddlesticks silence
body: fiddle's silence is op because he can silence you more than once. I just finished a rank and fiddle silenced me and i was at least 1000 range away cause malachite ulted at me. We kinda lost cause that silence. i wasn't able to ultra and i was syndra i was out the entire fight.

replies.body:
I was going to give you a tip on how to play, but I think you could use some tips on how to talk/type first. Ult not ultra, there is no "ultra" anywhere in ultimate. Malphite? Malachite is copper mineral and not a league champion. If you have to say and more than once, rephrase your sentence since it will become a run-on very quickly and easily making you sound like a blithering idiot.

You positioned badly and got caught, they then used that to 100-0 you. Fiddle is a mage assassin meant to hard cc someone from 100-0, but he can deal his ultimate in a huge aoe making him perfect for wombo combos.
Fiddle can't take you out within that silence. Talon could kill you before you could react at all.

Talon's silence was removed because he would silence you, 100-0 you in that second, and walk away.

Now you have time to counterplay him, your death was purely you being mispositioned.

Lol, so you basically want Fiddle's to be gone from the game? Talon still can do crazy damage without his silence. They already nerfed fear so it does this stupid thing where you run away from him. Nerfing him more would just mean they need to rework all together.
